mapper.insert: insert into employee(emp_no, emp_pw, emp_addr, emp_tel, emp_email, emp_name, emp_posit, emp_state, admin_code, dept_code) values (EMP_NO_SEQ.nextval, #{empPw}, #{empAddr}, #{empTel}, #{empEmail}, #{empName}, #{empPosit}, #{empState}, #{adminCode}, #{deptCode})
mapper.update: update employee set emp_pw = #{empPw}, emp_addr = #{empAddr}, emp_tel = #{empTel}, emp_email = #{empEmail}, emp_name = #{empName}, emp_posit = #{empPosit}, emp_state = #{empState}, admin_code = #{adminCode}, dept_code = #{deptCode} where emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.select: select * from EMPLOYEE order by emp_no ${desc}
